title: Designing Non-Procedural Skill Training for Anesthesiology Residents: Application of Gagné's Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Simulation-based and team collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze pre-operative management protocols for diabetic patients and explain the clinical rationale.
Learners can develop modules to teach complex non-procedural skills by applying the nine-stage instructional design principles of the ADDIE model.
Learners can perform decision-making processes considering multidimensional variables in a simulation environment with ≥80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
